channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Privilege Vault Remote

item.title: CVE-2020-4607|2024-09-17T01:40:44.853Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20privilege%20vault%20remote
item.description: IBM Security Secret Server (IBM Security Verify Privilege Vault Remote 1.2 ) could allow a local user to bypass security restrictions due to improper input validation. IBM X-Force ID: 184884.
